Description détaillée
Toolbox Class
Documentation des fonctions membres
append_params() append_paramsToolbox Toolboxappend_params
static append_params ( $array, $separator = '&' , $parent = '' )[static]
Converts an array of parameters into a query string to be appended to a URL.
Paramètres
array$array
parameters to append to the query string.
string$separator
separator may be defined as & to display purpose
string$parent
This should be left blank (it is used internally by the function).
Renvoie
string Query string to append to a URL.

Paramètres
string$log

string

0.85

integer 0 if PHP not compiled with memory_limit support, 1 no memory limit (memory_limit = -1), 2 insufficient memory for GLPI, 3 enough memory for GLPI

getFgColor() getFgColorToolbox ToolboxgetFgColor
static getFgColor (string $color = "" , int $offset = 40 , bool $inherit_if_transparent = false )[static]
Return a frontground color for a given background color if bg color is light, we'll return dark fg color else a light fg color
Paramètres
string$color
the background color in hexadecimal notation (ex FFFFFF) to compute
int$offset
how much we need to darken/lighten the color
bool$inherit_if_transparent
if color contains an opacity value, and if this value is too transparent return 'inherit'
Renvoie
string hexadecimal fg color (ex FFFFFF)

getMailServerProtocolInstance() getMailServerProtocolInstanceToolbox ToolboxgetMailServerProtocolInstance
static getMailServerProtocolInstance (string $protocol_type)[static]
Returns protocol instance for given mail server type.
Class should implements Glpi\Mail\Protocol\ProtocolInterface or should be \Laminas\Mail\Protocol\Imap|\Laminas\Mail\Protocol\Pop3 for native protocols.
Paramètres
string$protocol_type
Renvoie
null|\Glpi\Mail\Protocol\ProtocolInterface|\Laminas\Mail\Protocol\Imap|\Laminas\Mail\Protocol\Pop3

resizePicture() resizePictureToolbox ToolboxresizePicture
static resizePicture ( $source_path, $dest_path, $new_width = 71 , $new_height = 71 , $img_y = 0 , $img_x = 0 , $img_width = 0 , $img_height = 0 , $max_size = 500 )[static]
Resize a picture to the new size Always produce a JPG file!
Depuis
0.85
Paramètres
string$source_path
path of the picture to be resized
string$dest_path
path of the new resized picture
integer$new_width
new width after resized (default 71)
integer$new_height
new height after resized (default 71)
integer$img_y
y axis of picture (default 0)
integer$img_x
x axis of picture (default 0)
integer$img_width
width of picture (default 0)
integer$img_height
height of picture (default 0)
integer$max_size
max size of the picture (default 500, is set to 0 no resize)
Renvoie
boolean
